settings.title:
Period Cup Fit
What You Need to Know?
Saalt Teen
settings.descr:
Light to normal flow (1-2 tampons)
Under 18 years or petite physique
Low cervix *see how-to here

settings.title: Saalt Regular
settings.descr:
Normal to heavy flow (3–4 tampons)
High-capacity
High cervix *see how-to here

settings.title: Saalt Small
settings.descr:
Light to normal flow (2–3 tampons)
First-time user and 18 years or older
Low cervix *see how-to here

settings.title: We're here to get you to period bliss.
settings.description: If you're not happy with your Saalt product, we'll send you a replacement you'll love or your money back per our Period Bliss Guarantee.
settings.subtitle: Reach out to our Saalt Gurus

settings.descr: This is the first cup I've ever used and I LOVE it! Literally cannot feel it at all when inserted. And the underwear is so comfortable, much more so than disposable pads. I was skeptical but they are some sort of sorcery because they stay dry! I'm telling anyone who will listen to give these products a try.
settings.author: Kelsey R.
